lead_paragraph: An obvious appeal of "House of Cards" is that it takes the United States' already dysfunctional politics and reduces it ad absurdum, Anand Giridharadas writes.

headline.main: The Purity of a Ruthless TV Couple
headline.print_headline: The Purity of a Ruthless TV Couple

snippet: An obvious appeal of "House of Cards" is that it takes the United States' already dysfunctional politics and reduces it ad absurdum, Anand Giridharadas writes.
